contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''Lone Tree, Oklahoma''' is a rural community in eastern [[Okmulgee County, Oklahoma|Okmulgee County]], about six miles east of [[Morris, Oklahoma]]; was named for a "lone tree" sitting on the skyline of a mountain. Lone Tree Church is also located in this area near High Spring Mountains. Lone Tree is the birthplace of [[Anita Hill]], notable for accusing [[Supreme Court of the United States|Supreme Court]] Justice [[Clarence Thomas]] of [[sexual harassment]] during his confirmation hearings in 1991. {{Coord|35|35|33|N|95|44|53|W|format=dms|display=title|type:city_region:US-OK}} [[Category:Unincorporated communities in Oklahoma]] [[Category:Geography of Okmulgee County, Oklahoma]] {{Oklahoma-geo-stub}}
